languages.text: {n}При вашем приближении он почтительно склоняется.{/n} "Ваша Светлость, рад вновь видеть, что голову вашу Друз охранил от еретиков и ксеносов. Жаль, встречаемся мы вновь при скорбных событиях. В прошлый раз мы виделись на похоронах, а теперь, кажется, по половине Футфола пора служить панихиду".

traits.locale_text: {n}При вашем приближении он почтительно склоняется.{/n} "Ваша Светлость, рад вновь видеть, что голову вашу Друз охранил от еретиков и ксеносов. Жаль, встречаемся мы вновь при скорбных событиях. В прошлый раз мы виделись на похоронах, а теперь, кажется, по половине Футфола пора служить панихиду".
traits.speaker: Footfall_Chaplain_Ch04

languages.text: {n}As you approach, he bows deferentially.{/n} "Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, it's nice to see that Saint Drusus has protected your neck from the heretics and the xenos since we last met. Shame how it's always sad events that bring us together. The last time was at a funeral, and now it feels like half of Footfall needs a memorial service."
languages.original_text: {n}При вашем приближении он почтительно склоняется.{/n} "Ваша Светлость, рад вновь видеть, что голову вашу Друз охранил от еретиков и ксеносов. Жаль, встречаемся мы вновь при скорбных событиях. В прошлый раз мы виделись на похоронах, а теперь, кажется, по половине Футфола пора служить панихиду".

Shame how it's always sad events that bring us together. The previous time was at a funeral, and now it feels like half of Footfall needs a memorial service."

Shame how it's always sad events that bring us together. The last time was at a funeral, and now it feels like half of Footfall needs a memorial service."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Chaplain_Ch04

languages.text: {n}当你走近时，他恭敬地鞠了一躬。{/n}“大人，很高兴看到自从我们上次分别之后，圣德鲁苏斯一直在保护你的性命，让你免受异端分子和异形的侵扰。真遗憾，我们总是在悲痛的场合见面。上次是在那场葬礼，至于现在，恐怕半个落脚港都要举行葬礼了。”
languages.original_text: {n}As you approach, he bows deferentially.{/n} "Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, it's nice to see that Saint Drusus has protected your neck from the heretics and the xenos since we last met. Shame how it's always sad events that bring us together. The last time was at a funeral, and now it feels like half of Footfall needs a memorial service."

traits.locale_text: {n}当你走近时，他恭敬地鞠了一躬。{/n}“大人，很高兴看到自从我们上次分别之后，圣德鲁苏斯一直在保护你的性命，让你免受异端分子和异形的侵扰。真遗憾，我们总是在悲痛的场合见面。上次是在那场葬礼上，至于现在，恐怕半个落脚港都要举行葬礼了。”
traits.speaker: Footfall_Chaplain_Ch04

languages.text: {n}あなたが近付くと、彼は恭しくお辞儀をした。{/n}「陛下。以前あった時から、聖ドルススがあなたの首を異端者や異種族から守ってくださったようで、安心しました。残念ながら、私達が再会する時はいつも悲しい出来事の後です。前回は葬儀で、今はフットフォールの半分が追悼式を必要としているようです」
languages.original_text: {n}As you approach, he bows deferentially.{/n} "Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, it's nice to see that Saint Drusus has protected your neck from the heretics and the xenos since we last met. Shame how it's always sad events that bring us together. The last time was at a funeral, and now it feels like half of Footfall needs a memorial service."

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたが近付くと、彼は恭しくお辞儀をした。{/n}「陛下。以前あった時から、聖ドルススがあなたの首を異端者や異種族から守ってくださったようで、安心しました。残念ながら、私達が再会する時はいつも悲しい出来事の後です。前回は葬儀で、今はフットフォールの半分が追悼式を必要としているようです」
traits.speaker: Footfall_Chaplain_Ch04

languages.text: {n}Al acercarte, se inclina ante ti con deferencia.{/n} «Mi{mf|lord|lady}, me alegra ver que san Drusus {mf|le|la} ha protegido de los herejes y de los xenos desde la última vez que nos vimos. Lástima que siempre sean acontecimientos tristes los que nos unan. La última vez fue un funeral y ahora parece que medio Paso necesite de exequias».
languages.original_text: {n}As you approach, he bows deferentially.{/n} "Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, it's nice to see that Saint Drusus has protected your neck from the heretics and the xenos since we last met. Shame how it's always sad events that bring us together. The last time was at a funeral, and now it feels like half of Footfall needs a memorial service."

traits.locale_text: {n}Al acercarte, se inclina ante ti con deferencia.{/n} «Mi{mf|lord|lady}, me alegra ver que san Drusus {mf|le|la} ha protegido de los herejes y de los xenos desde la última vez que nos vimos. Lástima que siempre sean acontecimientos tristes los que nos unan. La última vez fue un funeral y ahora parece que medio Paso necesite de exequias».
traits.speaker: Footfall_Chaplain_Ch04

languages.text: {n}Als du dich näherst, verbeugt er sich ehrerbietig.{/n} "Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft, wie schön, dass der Heilige Drusus Euren Hals vor den Ketzern und den Xenos beschützt hat, seit wir uns das letzte Mal gesehen haben. Ein Jammer, dass wir immer durch traurige Ereignisse zusammengeführt werden. Das letzte Mal war es bei einem Begräbnis, nun fühlt es sich an, als würde halb Footfall eine Trauerfeier benötigen."
languages.original_text: {n}As you approach, he bows deferentially.{/n} "Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, it's nice to see that Saint Drusus has protected your neck from the heretics and the xenos since we last met. Shame how it's always sad events that bring us together. The last time was at a funeral, and now it feels like half of Footfall needs a memorial service."

traits.locale_text: {n}Als du dich näherst, verbeugt er sich ehrerbietig.{/n} "Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft, wie schön, dass der Heilige Drusus Euren Hals vor den Ketzern und den Xenos beschützt hat, seit wir uns das letzte Mal gesehen haben. Ein Jammer, dass wir immer durch traurige Ereignisse zusammengeführt werden. Das letzte Mal war es bei einem Begräbnis, nun fühlt es sich an, als würde halb Footfall eine Trauerfeier benötigen."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Chaplain_Ch04

languages.text: {n}Il s'incline avec déférence à votre approche.{/n} « Votre Seigneurie, je suis ravi de voir que Saint Drusus vous a gardé des hérétiques et des xénos. Cela dit, je regrette que les circonstances qui nous rassemblent ne soient pas plus plaisantes que la dernière fois. Nous nous sommes croisés lors de funérailles, et maintenant, j'ai l'impression que la moitié de Castel aurait besoin d'obsèques... »
languages.original_text: {n}As you approach, he bows deferentially.{/n} "Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, it's nice to see that Saint Drusus has protected your neck from the heretics and the xenos since we last met. Shame how it's always sad events that bring us together. The last time was at a funeral, and now it feels like half of Footfall needs a memorial service."

traits.locale_text: {n}Il s'incline avec déférence à votre approche.{/n} « Votre Seigneurie, je suis ravi de voir que Saint Drusus vous a gardé des hérétiques et des xénos. Cela dit, je regrette que les circonstances qui nous rassemblent ne soient pas plus plaisantes que la dernière fois. Nous nous sommes rencontrés lors de funérailles, et maintenant, j'ai l'impression que la moitié de Castel aurait besoin d'obsèques... »
traits.speaker: Footfall_Chaplain_Ch04

languages.text: {n}Ona yaklaştığında saygıyla başını eğiyor.{/n} "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, son karşılaşmamızdan beri Aziz Drusus'un boynunuzu kâfirlere ve zenolara karşı koruduğunu görmek güzel. Bizi bir araya getiren şeylerin her zaman üzüntü verici olaylar olması çok yazık. Geçen sefer bir cenazedeydik, şimdi de Binliman'ın yarısı için cenaze töreni düzenlenmesi gerekiyor gibi duruyor."
languages.original_text: {n}As you approach, he bows deferentially.{/n} "Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, it's nice to see that Saint Drusus has protected your neck from the heretics and the xenos since we last met. Shame how it's always sad events that bring us together. The last time was at a funeral, and now it feels like half of Footfall needs a memorial service."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ona yaklaştığında saygıyla başını eğiyor.{/n} "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, son karşılaşmamızdan beri Aziz Drusus'un boynunuzu kâfirlere ve zenolara karşı koruduğunu görmek güzel. Bizi bir araya getiren şeylerin her zaman üzüntü verici olaylar olması çok yazık. Geçen sefer bir cenazedeydik, şimdi de Binliman'ın yarısı için cenaze töreni düzenlenmesi gerekiyor gibi duruyor."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Chaplain_Ch04
